sourcesContent:
import { Paper, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow } from "@material-ui/core" import { useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { fetchGoal } from "../../../store/actions/courseGoal.action" import { LoadingRows } from "../SituationRow" const CourseGoal = ({ mamh }) => { const goals = useSelector(state => state.course[mamh].goal) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if (!goals.data) dispatch(fetchGoal(mamh)) }, [dispatch, mamh, goal.data]) return Mục tiêu Mô tả Chuẩn đầu ra CTĐT
} export default CourseGoal
